sentence: Tal Axelrod Herschel Walker clinches GOP Senate nomination in Georgia 7:58 p.m. Former NFL star Herschel Walker is projected to easily clinch the Republican Senate nomination in Georgia, securing his spot on the ballot to face off against Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-Ga.) in November.
